text: Adrian Hasler (born February 11, 1964) is a Liechtenstein politician. He was elected Prime Minister of Liechtenstein in 2013. He became the Prime Minister of Liechtenstein on March 27, 2013. He left office in March 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== *Adrian Hasler at the official website of the government of Liechtenstein. title: Adrian Hasler
